text: "Show Me Love" is a 1994 song by Swedish group Yaki-Da. It was their debut single, taken from the group's studio album, Pride. The song is written by Jonas Berggren from Ace of Base, who also produced it. "Show Me Love" reached number 15 in Denmark and number 16 in Norway. "Show Me Love" was re-recorded by Berggren's own band, Ace of Base, for their 2002 album, Da Capo. ==Track listing== ==Credits== *Written-By – Jonas "Joker" Berggren *Vocals – Linda Schonberg & Marie Knutsen *Produced-By - Joker *Recorded and Mixed-By – John Ballard & Joker ℗ 1994 Metronome Musik GmbH © 1994 Mega Records ==Charts== ===Weekly charts=== {| class="wikitable sortable" !align="left"|Chart !align="left"|Peak position |- |Denmark (IFPI) |align="center"|15 |- |} ==References== Category:1994 debut singles Category:1994 songs Category:Yaki-Da songs Category:1990s ballads Category:Pop ballads Category:Songs written by Jonas Berggren Category:Mega Records singles Category:English-language Swedish songs
title: Show Me Love (Yaki-Da song)
